It kind of feels like having a kid, blinking, and they are now turning into an adult.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For 2024, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://monopoly.mcdonalds.co.uk/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"McDonald's and MONOPOLY have supercharged the campaign","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" - by introducing ‚ÄúPower Peel‚Äù. Oh, and you can only play the Mr Monopoly Bonus Reward game mechanic once throughout the whole campaign.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"To help visualise this, I‚Äôve scribbled down some drawings of the players lifecycle.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"qQAFpy65pVHWTNyIG4GAd","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Consumer facing design and User Experience (UX)","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Starting with the campaign's key visual. It clearly has a bold and vibrant new neon and \"peel back\" style. The typography is strong, but with variation. The red and yellow colours are defiantly on-brand, complimenting both McDonald‚Äôs and MONOPOLY‚Äôs similar red and yellow.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4hJXaivHVWhyHEvEFmsZGT","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"But... (there is always a but... but not always bad) compared to previous years, the creatives decided to take a more punchy approach for the colour palette. More Virginia Avenue, States Avenue, and St. Charles Place. Less of the historic blue'ie feel of the campaign's key visual, and way, way, more pink - which I really like!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"5wiUbsE29kl0z3UOhTCIlW","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"As for the mobile app, the campaign leverages the official McDonald‚Äôs U.K app, which means it has nothing ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"really","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" to do with, or related to, Hasbro's Monopoly. For the digital winning mechanics, it looks like the tms digital team have built and embedded an app-separate web experience into a modal body, within the mobile app. Which I fully support, as this keeps the consumers digital experience within the fortress of user sessions and authentication, minimising the risk of promo compers and those who want to try and manipulate the system.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I did find myself opening the experience on my laptop (outside of the app üôà) and digging around the tmsiwin source code to see how the front-end was built. Needless to say, the tms team had used an array of familiar technologies, such as Cloudflare, Vue, GSAP, PixiJS, Google Fonts, Piwik Pro Analytics (etc). ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"AND, it's all packaged in under 6.5MB of resource.","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Kudos!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The layout of the mobile experience has been structured in a format that I would have expected to see. It's strong and clear, with primary navigation at the bottom of the page and secondary at the top right side. Perfect for the thumb zone","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":", if you hold you mobile with your right hand.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"2zRowk2mJ24v2v8R9220tA","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"MQNPqBDTZWPczKPgbYQ4t","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The mobile design has not been made overly complicated, which is a positive to see. But, in my opinion, it does lack ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"some","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" button prioritisation as a minor point, and colour contrasts for visual accessibility. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Especially","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" when you consider that the ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.statista.com/forecasts/1335605/mcdonalds-restaurant-chains-brand-profile-in-the-uk"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"brand awareness of McDonald‚Äôs","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" in the UK sits at 96%, with approximately 43.5 million UK consumers.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For any brand, that's a LOT of eyes!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I would also question some of the copy placement, for example, the notice which tells consumers to keep hold of their games pieces. From my experience designing consumer facing entry campaign for the likes of ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.chriswatterston.com/work/case-study/lucozade-energy-xbox-halo-drink-campaign?utm_source=dripfed&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=mcdonaldsmonopoly"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lucozade Halo","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" and ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.chriswatterston.com/work/case-study/ribena-hasbro-games-fmcg-drink-campaign?utm_source=dripfed&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=mcdonaldsmonopoly"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Ribena Hasbro","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":", this should defiantly be at the top of the page, above the ‚ÄòDigital Peel unlocked‚Äô card. This is a vital bit of information which could make or ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"break","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" a consumers ability to claim their prize!!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"2YihuhL1NZQpZMpyV7q0kp","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"On a final note, it‚Äôs defiantly ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"worth","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" highlighting the very noticeable in-app colour changes when we wake-up on a Mayfair Monday (Oh, hello blue). It creates a strong contrast on the ‚ÄòScan‚Äô button. Really nice!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"9VV9IQyPYUz43emR8rIPV","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Conclusion","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"My short though of it... I LOVE IT! The campaign has been sparked from the obvious pre-successor, but for me, this still beats the rest. I briefly remember my first McDonald MONOPOLY experience, when you only had to be aged 16 or over, and there was no mobile app","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"... the good old days.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The 2024 digital user experience for this campaign has been executed brilliantly, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"with some minor recommendation for certain item placements","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":". The consumer journey is clear, persist, and doesn't create any blockers when transitioning into the digital space. With a campaign of this size, it's safe to say the expectation from the target audience having a smartphone for app access, is off the table. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.uswitch.com/mobiles/studies/mobile-statistics/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"As of 2023 in the UK, 98% of those aged 16-24 have a smartphone, and 86% of those aged 55-64","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"7b7h9O4BDe928zp7IyBawj","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This McDonald's MONOPOLY promotion launched on Wednesday 4th September, and is running for six weeks - ending 15th October 2024. Although to play, you must be aged 18 or over. Which yes, the age requirement can be a head scratcher for most, but if you take the laws around promotions, sweepstakes, gambling, contracts, and marketing/consumer protection, it makes perfect sense.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"So, sorry kids (unless, it's your 18th birthday).","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Check out the TV advert at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://youtu.be/nVUpnl0HHrM?si=OXTsZVgBULrmDRlB"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://youtu.be/nVUpnl0HHrM?si=OXTsZVgBULrmDRlB","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
